Website Up and Running!

Jul 16, 2018 â€¢ bregnery

I am excited that this website is finally up and running!

This Website was build using Jekyll with the Jekyll Doc Theme. I highly recommend the Jekyll Doc Theme; It is well coded and uses bootstrap to go the extra step in making a gorgeous design.

For the logo, I used logomakr, which is a free logo making website.

Please enjoy my website! And feel free to use the links on this post to make your own!
